TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceDescription extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Representation of a resource whose contents are to be embedded in the output assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public ResourceDescription (string resourceName, Func<System.IO.Stream> dataProvider, bool isPublic);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string resourceName, class System.Func`1<class System.IO.Stream> dataProvider, bool isPublic) cil managed

Docs.param: The callers will dispose the result after use. This allows the resources to be opened and read one at a time.
True if the resource is public.
Docs.summary: Creates a representation of a resource whose contents are to be embedded in the output assembly.
Docs.remarks: Returns a stream of the data to embed.

MemberSignature.Value: public ResourceDescription (string resourceName, string fileName, Func<System.IO.Stream> dataProvider, bool isPublic);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string resourceName, string fileName, class System.Func`1<class System.IO.Stream> dataProvider, bool isPublic) cil managed

Docs.param: File name with an extension to be stored in metadata.
The callers will dispose the result after use. This allows the resources to be opened and read one at a time.
True if the resource is public.
Docs.summary: Creates a representation of a resource whose file name will be recorded in the assembly.
Docs.remarks: Function returning a stream of the resource content (used to calculate hash).
